meanings.sent1: The panda's nonadaptive behavior made it difficult for them to find enough food.
meanings.sent2: The nonadaptive strategy led to the team's defeat in the game.
meanings.sent3: The nonadaptive squirrel kept trying to climb the glass window, thinking it was a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadaptive approach to problem-solving left her stuck in the same situation.
meanings.sent5: The nonadaptive plant wilted under the harsh sunlight, unable to thrive.

meanings.definition: Not able to adjust to new conditions.
meanings.sent1: The old car's nonadaptive engine struggled to keep up with modern traffic.
meanings.sent2: The nonadaptive student found it challenging to switch to online learning.
meanings.sent3: The nonadaptive robot kept bumping into walls, unable to navigate the room.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadaptive mindset hindered her from embracing change and growth.
meanings.sent5: The nonadaptive clock refused to reset itself for daylight saving time.

meanings.definition: Not evolving to better suit the environment.
meanings.sent1: The nonadaptive species faced extinction due to its inability to adapt to climate change.
meanings.sent2: The nonadaptive design of the building made it inefficient in conserving energy.
meanings.sent3: The nonadaptive fashion trend failed to catch on with the younger generation.
meanings.sent4: His nonadaptive behavior kept him stuck in the same unfulfilling routine.
meanings.sent5: The nonadaptive bird struggled to find enough food in its changing habitat.
